summary: An armor mod I've been working on the mesh and texture files are in the folder can't seem to grasp plugging it into the game and can't afford to spend any more time on it. Cheers to whoever likes it and wants to pick it up.
descriptionHtml:
This contains Meshes and texture maps only. (I got a little mixed up in descriptions.) I looked up the type of render workflow the game uses so I have spec/gloss maps for my armor. Some gloss maps are _spec while all specular maps _specular. Any issues or concerns I will be happy to help if I can. If you use a metal workflow I may be able to convert the maps as I used substance painter to texture the armor. All images are arnold renders and do not represent results on how the armor will look in game.
Here is a sketchfab link for an even better look.
https://sketchfab.com/models/9b3bfbb48f1a4d3f915f4e4fe1ddbeeb
(added objs with male and female varients for those having trouble with fbx)
author: mmccarthy4

files.name: female fbx and obj and male obj
